title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Annual posts in millions, with a total of 5 data points.
Overall Annual posts in millions has decreased over the Year.
Annual posts in millions is slightly decreasing from 2020 to 2016.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2016.
Max Annual posts in millions about 6.12 was recorded at Year 2020
Min Annual posts in millions about 1.26 was recorded at Year 2016
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Annual posts in millions with a total of 5 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is decreasing which exists from 2016 to 2020.
